title: Cartes Synoptiques de la Chromosphère Solaire et Catalogue des Filaments de la Couche Supérieure
aka: Cartes Synoptiques de la Chromosphère Solaire et Catalogue des Filaments et des Centres d'Activité
additional-notes: This is a French publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This serial's title ended with 'de la Couche Supérieure' from 1931 to 1957, and with 'et des Centres d'Activité' from 1959 to 1989.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Joe Kishman for copyright research on this title.
